name: Tekkengine
description:
A retro fighting game made in 25 days with Godot Engine. 

CONTROLS:

Player 1:

  • Movement - WASD 
  • Attacks - R(left punch), T(right punch), F(left kick), G(right kick)
  • Block - Y

Player 2:

  • Movement - Arrow Keys
  • Attacks - I(left punch), O(right punch), K(left kick), L(right kick)
  • Block - P
